channel.title: Could use some advise regarding source + client
channel.description: hey guys, i was searching this site for some days now and i can't really find a source+client revision 317-530 that has skills working (especially mining, smithing, fletching and crafting) aswell as easy to change xp-rates, since i would love to have the original rates, so i wanted to ask straight forward, does anyone know a source+client that would fit into that criteria? (please keep in mind that i'm no java programmer, i can edit some values when they're tagged so i know what they change but not much more) =(

item.title: Could use some advise regarding source + client
item.dc:creator: @Woolridge Woolridge
item.description:
@Woolridge wrote:

hey guys, i was searching this site for some days now and i can’t really find a source+client revision 317-530 that has skills working
(especially mining, smithing, fletching and crafting) aswell as easy to change xp-rates, since i would love to have the original rates,
so i wanted to ask straight forward, does anyone know a source+client that would fit into that criteria?
(please keep in mind that i’m no java programmer, i can edit some values when they’re tagged so i know what they change but not much more) =(
